评论详情: Comfortable and super cute!

I liked the color of these, but they were quite heavy and I could tell that I’d need to break them in a lot in order to get past them causing blisters on the backs of my heels. The quality was good, which was expected of Sam Edelman.  I am usually a size 6.5 and took Amazon’s recommendation of getting a size 7. They fit like a size 6.5 in my opinion.
I loved the look of these sneakers. After reading reviews I bought my true size. They were definitely running small so I’m returning them. I would order them again 1/2 size up.

评论概述: Nice shoes very attractive but stiff
评论详情: I like these but they are just a little uncomfortable. Nice width though
As soon as I took these shoes from the box I noticed the poor quality on the sides of the shoes. The mesh sides have loose spots on them. I didn't even try these on; they're going right back.
A++. I ordered white and gold. True to size, and I’m able to wear them to work and be comfortable. I recommend them!

These shoes are an absolute dream! Combining style and quality! They are incredibly comfortable and a top contender for the hottest trends, rivaling the latest styles. You won’t believe how stylish you’ll look while feeling fantastic!

This was love at first sight !! Very nice, look very cool, Beware of the size chart it's wrong. I'm usually 8.5 but this size does not correspond with my foot size I ended up buying size. The right one is 8
Beautiful sneaker but I have to say that they are not very comfortable
Great, stylish, and comfortable shoes. I wear them all the time. Get complimented on them every time I wear them.
This show is quality and well made
Comfortable and goes with just about everything.  True to size.

This sneaker was not an everyday shoe for me. It was something to change up in, so it was maybe worn 5 or 6 times since October '24. As you can see the fabric is separating from the structure piece ( it actually feels like cardboard) underneath it causing a "bubble" in the fabric.  The shoe was comfortable, but the quality of these shoes is NOT worth the price. This was my first and last purchase of this brand. Do better Sam Edelman!!
Love for a casual shoe

评论概述: Very cute but hard to clean!
评论详情: Fit true to size. I am petite so I love the way they give me a slight height increase. However, they are truly HARD to keep clean. If you scuff the white, a magic eraser will not clean. I had to use lemon oil and really scrub. And then the toe area does crease and seems to have a dark shadowing. I actually just accidentally dropped a seasoned, oily piece of food on them and tried to clean them-they’re ruined. The area just spread throughout the whole shoe when I got them wet. However, I do like them enough-and the price-to buy another pair and find some type of shoe protectant for them.
Really great fashion sneakers. Black and white color combo is very nice. She’s really a little stiff and hard to put on at first, but hoping they all stretch a little to my foot overtime.
Súper cómodo y bonito
Love these sneakers , very comfortable

I have been eyeing these shoes for months and when they went on sale I had to get them! I’m a little sad i didn’t just get them sooner! lol they are so cute and so comfortable, they have fantastic arch support  for my flat feet and fit true to size! They seem super high quality and really durable! I’m just so excited about these and can’t wait to order another pair of these Layla sneakers!
I was a bit apprehensive ab getting g these & not able to try them on. They really are true to size. I wear anywhere btwn a 9 & 9.5, & a 9 fit & feel great. TYSM!
Shoes fit true to size.  Color as described. Perfect fit - no break-in needed.  Clean easily with damp warm rag.  Not a heavy shoe but a nice quality supportive shoe.
This are very very comfortable for walking and so stylish. They fit perfectly and it’s a yes if your thinking of them

Bought these in October and they are already falling apart.  The body is completely detaching from the bottom of the shoe. I think they are also uncomfortable, cause my foot to cramp. Not supportive. Shoe laces also broke 1 month in and I had to replace!
Very pretty shoes. You need to go up a size or half size. Very durable. Comfortable.  They are an attention grabber.

I get so many compliments on these shoes and people wanting to know where I got them. Love the support, comfort, and fit true to size. I actually “broke these in” on a trip to DC. We walked miles and miles and these shoes did not hurt my feet at all! They’re not as lightweight as tennis shoes, but they’re great quality and worth the price.
Me encantaron, muy bellos y cómodos
Cute colors and comfortable. Only negative is that they’re heavier than I thought they would be.
Shoes Are super cute but run small. I wear a solid 7 and these are tight. Went to order a 7.5 and they are not available. Disappointed.
Pretty comfortable- but not for all day walking
Wife loves them.
Love the quality and fit
Super comfortable and cute!

I get compliments on these every time I wear them.  Love them!
I have become pretty picky about shoes as I’m on my feet all day for work.  I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable they are and how well they fit. Plus they’re super cute and go with anything!
I get compliments when I wear these sneakers. They are really cute and go with just about anything. True to size and comfortable.
I love these they are very comfortable that is important, stylish and priced just right a true silver sneaker

评论概述: Black bled on the White - Got a little wet in the rain
评论详情: The shoes were only worn a few times and when on vacation they got a little wet in the rain and the black suede bled onto the white and there was no way to get it off.  I sent a message to seller and they want me to pay for the return which would cost $25.00 plus $10 in insurance.  However, I can't do that because I wore them on vacay and didn't have room in carry on luggage to bring them back so they got left in florida.  They gave me NO other option even when pictures were sent showing how the black bled onto the white.  Poor customer service!!!!
I have gotten a few compliments on these. Very cute for the price I paid around sixty.
Saw in store and regretted not buying so was glad Amazon had them. Most comfortable tennis shoe I’ve ever had!!!!
They are a bit clunky, but that is the style now. Well made and attractive. Very comfortable.
I needed a green shoe for vacation and these were so comfy. We walked a lot in Vegas and my feet were so comfy in these shoes.
I am a nurse and wear these for work. Excellent support and I get many compliments on them.
loved these shoes so much - but when I wore them in the rain, they were immediately ruined. The blue suede bled into the white.

评论概述: Cutest shoes but not wide enough
评论详情: I would have given a lot for a wide size in these! They are so cute and comfortable, but I needed just a tad wider. I kept seeing them on Merrick's Art site, and how she pairs them with so many outfits. Highly recommend if you don't need wide.
This shoe is very cute but was not comfy at all. The tongue part dug into my ankle and hurt very much with each step.  Plus the sole is very stiff. Instant return.

评论概述: Buyer Beware - Beautiful, unless you want them clean, and ZERO Customer Support
评论详情: I purchased these shoes on September 15th and LOVED THEM. Truly… comfortable, cute, all great. In late November, I noticed some dirt on the white areas and wanted to keep them as clean as possible, so I checked out the reviews and other details to learn now to wash, and I followed those instructions. I spot cleaned the white only, careful not to touch the black. Everything seemed great. As they fully dried overnight, everything black bled onto the white and now the shoes are not wearable (if you care what they look like)… here’s the kicker that makes me the most frustrated. I reached out to Sam Edelman support because that’s what Amazon makes you do, and they refuse to stand behind their product or order any support for issues related to this. They made the shoe. They knew it would do this, and yet, this practically brand new shoe that I spend $70 is down the drain and they’re just hoping I’ll buy another pair. Well, never again, and I recommend you don’t either.

I bought these for a New York trip and they were perfect. Very comfortable and stylish. I receive compliments every time I wear them. They even look cute with dress pants to teach in.  I ended up buying the a boot in the same brand because I loved these and love them too.
I have this same shoe in another color which I love, however this gold pair are stiff and very uncomfortable.

I bought these before a trip and ended up wearing them for the entire 9 day trip, including long days shopping.  They seemed to fit just right when I got them, very snug but not too tight.  I wore them around the house for a while to make sure it wasn’t short lived and they were still comfortableAnd I’m glad I kept them.  The  thick sole made them comfortable while on my feet for hours.  They look cute and stylish with all kinds of outfits.  The only downfall is they’re not easy to put on and take off when trying on clothes and shoes.  I bought my usual size and wore them with wool socks and regular sport socks and the fit was good.  They seem durable and I did not have any issues with seams or quality at all.
I usually wear a 7 or a 7 1/2. The 7s were a little tight and the 7.5 were perfect. I get a lot of compliments.
These shoes go with everything and add a nice fashion edge. Comfy too.
These shoes are SOOOO CUTE! But, they are not comfortable at all. I have tried inserts, and it does nothing. I think Sam Edleman needs to stick to heels.

评论概述: Not for me, looks good on smaller feet
评论详情: The sneakers are very cute and I really like the color combination. When I tried them on they seemed very comfortable. But I have large feet so I didn’t like the way it looked on my feet but if I had smaller feet, I think I would probably keep them.
So stylish. Great purchase
These shoes are very comfortable, durable and light. Very stylish and goes with just about anything in my daily casual wardrobe. Eye catching without the price tag.
True to size and they are comfortable

I got these shoes in the brown color and I love the tweed on them very stylish. They have arch support. Just wearing them around the house, the arch support seems good. I haven't tested them walking around all day. I have a bad back and usually have to wear shoes with good arch support if I'm gonna be walking around more than just a few hours. I'm pretty sure these will be work. Cannot comment on longevity since I just purchased.

Really cute shoes, I've been on the hunt for a pair of "dressier" sneakers that I can dress up or down and these are exactly what I was looking for. However, these run unusually narrow and I suggest buying them in a wide size even if you don't have wide feet.

These were not the bang I was expecting, you know when you get something and you absolutely love it, that’s what I wanted.  They are just meh.  My NB’s in this color are so much better and much cheaper.

I wore these one time and got some stains on them that won’t come out. I’ve tried everything! They’re super cute and comfy but they won’t stay white for very long they also fit a little loose at the front end. There was a lot of room between the top of my foot to the shoe so the shoes have a DEEP crease in the front toe and now there’s a black line in that crease that won’t come out, not even with bleach. This is on both shoes. Save your money and dont buy these unless you only care to wear them once.
These are nice shoes, worth more than I paid. I will buy other shoes from this brand
Me encantaron, usualmente uso número 7 y me quedaron perfectos.
I’ve only worn these shoes a few times, and the silver finish is starting to peel off.  I’m bummed about it because they are comfy shoes!
Ideal

I kept these because I love Sam Edelman shoes and the style is just super trendy and cool. The shoes are very well made but definitely on the heavy side for sure. A little stiff too, but quality is top notch. I would recommend wearing socks as the interior is not breathable. For style though 10/10 for the rest prob 6.5/10 but would I still recommend - hands down yes!
Worn these several times! Comfy and can wear with most any outfit.

They are so Adorable!!! Well made!! Super comfy, and so stylish!!! I get so many compliments!!! Definitely recommend!!

They also creased in ONE day, so they even started looking as bad as they felt quickly. I’m a runner and athlete. I even wear zero drop low cushion shoes- I could not believe how crap these were

They're ok. They have such a wide platform that isn't really very pliable. Have been trying to break in for a year now. They aren't really an athletic shoe. And they aren't meant to be. So know that. As far as comfort after walking and wearing all day for a couple days? Nah..
True to sz and very comfortable.  Lightweight and easy to walk with
Fit great, very comfortable and look great.
Lightweight, very roomy and comfortable! practically no break in time, i wore these back to back days in NYC, doing a LOT of walking and my feet never got sore or swollen. i’m obsessed!
Nothing, very pleased.

I love it

The color is fabulous, goes with anything and very comfortable. I wore these for a whole day of shopping; walked 5+ miles in them and my legs and feet still felt great at the end of the day. I also ordered the tan and love them as well.

评论概述: Do NOT get them wet EVER!!!! Or they will be destroyed
评论详情: I loved these shoes from the get go. I bought them a year ago and wore them just a little beit before taking them on a trip to Italy last week where we got caught in a downpour which soaked the shoe. I left them to dry flat but the color bled upwards. Of course now it’s a year later and not able to return. Sam eldelman isn’t seeking to be too helpful either.  My opinion is - if you’re gonna make an expensive shoe with suede, you need to make sure that the suede has been washed enough and so the bleeding wouldn’t occur if they got wet. I don’t think any amount of pre-treatment would’ve helped this issue. Because I did spray them with a rain protector.
Loved the shoes, however, if they get wet, the gold bleeds on to the white and you are left with brown smudges all over your shoes.  Do not buy unless you don't plan on ever wearing them.

I really like these sneakers. I was, of course, influenced but I waited until they went on sale and I’m so happy with them. They are comfortable and look great with jeans. I got white so have to be careful where I wear them but they have been easy-ish to clean.

I love these and they are very different than the typical Nikes. I get compliments every time I wear them. I did spray them with a suede protector because I can tell they will be very difficult to clean if they get dirty (the black/white color). They cannot be washed in the washer like I do with my Nikes & Brooks, which is why I give them 4 stars. They are a bit heavy/stiff compared to workout sneakers, but I love them for street style & they’re so worth it. They are true to size, I have a wide foot but did not order a wide size and they fit perfectly. At $70 it’s a great price point for an upscale sneaker.
So comfortable and very well made! I love the design! True to size.
Can not recommend enough. So comfortable.
Cute but definitely not comfortable
Wow. These are SO comfortable and so stylish. The blue suede is so rich and the details are impeccable. An amazing fashion sneaker! Will buy Sam Edelman sneaks again for sure.
I love the look of these. The fit is spacious without being wide. Color is as expected from the website. Comfort is average to less than average, but I’ll put in new insoles for more comfort.

These are the most comfortable shoes! I own several pairs and can wear them all day without any problem. Perfect to size and very stylish. I always receive compliments when I wear my Sam Edelman sneakers.
These shoes are so pretty! They are well constructed and comfortable and go with so many things. I don’t think they were meant to work out in but for just regular wearing the are cute and stylish.
Beautiful and comfortable. True sizing

评论概述: Size 9. True to size and very comfortable.
评论详情: This brand, Sam Edelman, is the best. I ordered my true size (9) and they fit perfectly, not to mention how comfortable they are. I have since bought three more pairs of this brand, which are all so nice, stylish, and comfortable. I am a diabetic who travels often. My feet tend to swell up during flights. These shoes help my feet. I often get compliments when wearing them everywhere. I highly recommend this brand. You will definitely get your money's worth.
Beautifully made, extremely comfortable. I can normally wear an 8.5-9 size shoe and in these I did need the 9. They are the cutest runners/sneakers I have ever owned.
Ordered these in my older daughter’s school colors and now I’m about to order them in my younger daughter’s school colors! They are super comfortable and can be worn with jeans, shorts, leggings…etc.
